=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: One Piece - Collection Ten
Review Date: 2017/07/19
Store: Colleen Clinkebeard  (Actor),     Luci Christian  (Actor),     Mike McFarland  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Anime
Product Description: ['Hoping to save their beloved boat, the Straw Hats drop anchor at the shipbuilding city of Water 7, but the prognosis for the Going Merry proves far worse than expected. The hits keep coming as Robin mysteriously vanishes, the Franky Family robs the crew blind, and Usopp goes rogue after a shocking battle with Luffy! As if things weren’t bleak enough, the gang finds themselves accused of a cold-hearted assassination attempt – and hunted by the entire city. Luffy and his remaining mates hatch a plan to prove their innocence, but a sinister gang of cutthroat killers stays one step ahead of their every move. Dark secrets and tragic pasts are revealed as Luffy and Zoro fall to a formidable foe, Chopper faces a life and death situation, and a monstrous storm threatens to sink the city once and for all!']
Average Rating: 4.9
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 5.6 Ounces', 'Item model number': '704400092251', 'Director': 'Mike McFarland', 'Media Format': 'NTSC, Widescreen, Multiple Formats', 'Run time': '10 hours and 40 minutes', 'Release date': 'October 28, 2014', 'Actors': 'Colleen Clinkebeard, Luci Christian, Eric Vale, Sonny Strait, Christopher R. Sabat', 'Dubbed': 'English', 'Subtitles': 'English', 'Studio': 'Funimation Prod', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '4'}
Review Text: YOU seriously want to make sure you have the next collection after the collection you finish and just keep watching! I love how you don't know how the one piece story is going to end up and gets more interesting as the story goes on.
Review Title: one piece collection ten
Rating: 5.0

reference_summary:
American Originals
Various  (Actor),     History  (Director)    Rated:    Unrated    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, A&E Home Video, All A&E Titles
["They're a special breed - guys who go to work in the morning never knowing if they'll make it home alive that night. Every day is a struggle just to survive. For the loggers, wedged on a mountainside with behemoth trees, 60-ton machines, and razor-sharp chainsaws, the slightest miscalculation can spell disaster. The ice road truckers, steering gigantic 16-wheelers over frozen roads, face the specter of crashing through the surface, frostbite, or worse. And residents of the forbidding, icy north battle weather and unforgiving terrain just to eke out an existence. They all need every bit of ingenuity, grit, and know-how they can muster just to stay alive at least until the next gig.This adrenaline-pumping collection from HISTORY includes over 20 hours of action from Ax Men, Tougher in Alaska, and the record-breaking series Ice Road Truckers. You'll be awed as you watch these ordinary-seeming men face the kind of daily challenges most of us can't even imagine.Programs per disc:DISC 1: Ice Road Truckers S1, Vol 1: episodes 1-4DISC 2: Ice Road Truckers S1, Vol 2: episodes 5-8DISC 3: Ice Road Truckers S1, Vol 3: episodes 9-10 / bonus materialsDISC 4: Ice Road Truckers: On and Off The IceDISC 5: Dangerous Missions: Suicide Missions of D-Day / Marine Raiders / Forward Observers / PathfindersDISC 6: Dangerous Missions: Rescue Swimmers / Merrill's Marauders / Assault on Iwo Jima / Hostage NegotiatorsDISC 7: Ax Men S1, Vol 1: Man vs. Mountain / Risk and Reward / Storm Season Strikes / The Big HitDISC 8: Ax Men S1, Vol 2: Market Meltdown / Reversal of Fortune / The Close Call / Loggers Under FireDISC 9: Ax Men S1, Vol 3: A Logger's Thanksgiving / Black Friday / Storm of the CenturyDISC 10: Ax Men S1, Vol 4: The Toughest Season / Picking Up The Pieces / The Final HaulDISC 11: Tougher in Alaska S1, Vol 1: Episodes 1-4DISC 12: Tougher in Alaska S1, Vol 2: Episodes 5-7DISC 13: Tougher in Alaska S1, Vol 3: Episodes 8-10DISC 14: Tougher in Alaska S1, Vol 4: Episodes 11-13"]

The shows work great and liked the value package to see other shows I haven't.  I got it to see Ax men and Ice road truckers but think its great to see the other shows too.

Smokey and the Bandit (The 7-Movie Outlaw Collection)
Burt Reynolds  (Actor),     Sally Field  (Actor),     Hal Needham  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Boxed Sets, Comedy
["Strap yourself in for hours of high-speed high jinks and jaw-dropping fun as Smokey and The Bandit: The 7-Movie Outlaw Collection puts you in the driver's seat of the rowdiest road-movie franchise of all time. With the three original movies that turned Burt Reynolds and CB radios into national obsessions and the four television movies that spread Bandit mania to a whole new generation, this seven-movie, four-disc collection puts every legendary performer, every outrageous stunt, every dadgum catchphrase in the whole Bandit universe into one place—yours!", 'Bonus Content:', 'Disc 1 - Smokey and the Bandit:', 'Theatrical Trailer', 'Theatrical Trailer', 'Disc 1 - Smokey and the Bandit II:', 'Theatrical Trailer', 'Theatrical Trailer', 'Disc 2 - Smokey and the Bandit Part 3:', 'Theatrical Trailer', 'Theatrical Trailer', ']]>']

Willie and Alan help Miss Kay open a bakery, Jase gets up close and personal with his in-laws, Willie settles an old dodgeball score, and the Duck Commander team surprises two wounded veterans with a trip to Monroe.']

Lauren Brooks' The Kettlebell Body DVD
Lauren Brooks
Movies & TV, TV
['A genuine Lauren Brooks Kettlebell Fitness DVD']
{'Item Package Dimensions L x W x H': '7.5 x 5.3 x 0.6 inches', 'Package Weight': '0.3 Pounds', 'Item Weight': '0.01 Ounces', 'Brand Name': 'Lauren Brooks', 'Manufacturer': 'On The Edge Fitness', 'Part Number': 'LT', 'Best Sellers Rank': {'Movies & TV': 199846, 'DVD': 151734}, 'Date First Available': 'September 22, 2013'}
I fully understood this video as a way for me to build better body mechanics/decrease injury risk while doing lower reps to a higher kettlebell weight. I was very happy with the result. I was sweaty, did my own stretching additional to warm up after the workout. I have been looking for a video like this to help advance me. I have prior experience with kettlbells and I can appreciate the instructors vision/ideals into this video.  I have had pain in the past from using higher weights and high reps and after doing these videos and the stretching I seriously feel good. I don't give this review lightly. I don't find it boring either as I add on to my other workouts and excited to have a video to use my heavier bells in. I thought there wasn't a way for me to advance past using a 25 pound bell but this dvd helped. My heavier ones 35 pound ones are in use now. I usually dead lifted my 25 pound bell. With this video I dared to dead lift 70 pounds when I weigh 130 and no pain feels awesome!  It makes me think I could go even heavier eventually as I build up tolerance.
Lauren Brooks' The Kettlebell Body DVd

**Updated User Profile Summary:**

The user has a robust affinity for documentaries and reality TV, especially those centered on extreme professions and survival challenges. Their interests have expanded to include classic comedies and action films, reflecting a love for engaging storytelling and nostalgic cinema. Recently, they've developed a growing appreciation for narratives that blend humor with deeper themes, particularly those about personal struggles and faith, valuing messages of resilience.

In their latest interaction, the user expressed enthusiasm for an anime series, highlighting their enjoyment of engaging, serialized storytelling that captivates their interest over multiple installments. This aligns with their preference for diverse narratives that offer both entertainment and depth. Furthermore, they recently shared satisfaction with a fitness DVD focused on body mechanics and injury prevention, showcasing their commitment to personal health and effective kettlebell training.

Their evolving tastes now include a stronger interest in family-friendly comedy and anime that features complex characters, alongside a dedication to educational and inspirational fitness content. The user appreciates quality in their media choices, valuing a mix of high-stakes reality, uplifting narratives, and informative fitness resources, as well as narratives that resonate with broader themes of friendship and adventure.

Keywords reflecting their preferences include:

- Documentaries
- Reality TV
- Anime
- Survival challenges
- Classic movies
- Comedic storytelling
- Inspirational narratives
- Fitness resources
- Engaging plots
- Quality content
